answerText: Hesiod [10] Like the Theogony, this other epic work features a supreme god born stronger than his father who was in turn stronger than his own father. In this work, Marduk kills Tiamat and gets the Tablets of Destiny.
heading: Penn-ance |2012 | 6 | 1 | Literature | Classical | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: This man's intact Shield of Heracles and the fragmentary Catalogue of Women may in fact both be spurious. For 10 points each: [10] Name who Greek writer wrote about the Five Ages of Man in his Works and Days. His genealogy from the "birth of the gods" to the birth of the heroes is called the Theogony.
